title: Getting Started with Next.js 14
excerpt: Learn how to build modern web applications with Next.js 14 and TypeScript
content: Next.js 14 introduces powerful features like Server Actions, improved caching, and better performance. In this comprehensive guide, we'll explore how to leverage these features to build production-ready applications. We'll cover everything from setup to deployment, including best practices and common patterns. Whether you're new to Next.js or upgrading from a previous version, this guide will help you understand the latest improvements and how to use them effectively in your projects.
author: Sampath Kumar

title: Mastering TypeScript in 2025
excerpt: Deep dive into advanced TypeScript patterns and best practices
content: TypeScript has become the de facto standard for building scalable JavaScript applications. In this article, we'll explore advanced patterns including generics, utility types, conditional types, and more. You'll learn how to write type-safe code that scales with your application. We'll also cover common pitfalls and how to avoid them, best practices for structuring large TypeScript projects, and tips for improving your development workflow with TypeScript tooling.
author: Sampath Kumar

title: Building Scalable APIs with Node.js
excerpt: Best practices for creating robust and maintainable backend services
content: Learn how to build production-ready APIs using Node.js, Express, and modern best practices. We'll cover authentication, error handling, testing, and deployment strategies. This guide will help you create APIs that are both performant and maintainable. You'll discover how to structure your code for maximum reusability, implement proper logging and monitoring, handle security concerns, and optimize your API for performance at scale.
author: Sampath Kumar

title: React Performance Optimization
excerpt: Techniques to make your React apps lightning fast
content: Performance is crucial for user experience. In this guide, we'll explore various techniques to optimize your React applications, from basic memoization to advanced code splitting strategies. Learn about React.memo, useMemo, useCallback, lazy loading, and how to measure and improve your app's performance. We'll also discuss common performance pitfalls and how to avoid them, tools for profiling your React app, and real-world examples of performance improvements.
author: Sampath Kumar
